title: Apple removes 'Fakespot' app from iOS App Store following Amazon request - 9to5Mac
description: Apple on Friday removed the Fakespot app from the iOS App Store. Fakespot, which is a service for filtering and hiding fake product reviews on Amazon, launched its iOS app last month, but now, the app has been taken down following a request from Amazon itself. Fakespot founder Saoud Khalifah told The Verge that Apple […]
